title: #145: The Encoded Language of the Zodiac | Micah Dank
description:
Micah Dank is back to go deeper into the hidden meaning of the astrological signs that have become a part of our daily lives. The ancient people found a way to encode information about the seasons, the movement of the sun, and when it was time to put the plow on the bull.

Could the hidden symbols of the cross within the Zodiac point to a connection to religion, or did religion take the symbols and hijack them for their own causes? Micah Dank has thoughts on how the information from thousands of years ago has made its way into our modern society, and where we go from here.
